headline: Small carrier’s bankruptcy spells out need for factoring
summary: H5 transport, a North Dakota-based truckload and LTL carrier, has filed for bankruptcy protection under chapter 11 of the Federal Bankruptcy Code. It continues to operate, according to the court documents filed with the U.S. Bankruptcy Court for North Dakota. According to the company’s data available through the Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration, H5 is […] The post Small carrier’s bankruptcy spells out need for factoring appeared first on FreightWaves.
